title: ðŸš¨Freddie Kitchens fired by Browns - Emergency Podcast (Football 12/30)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to give their reactions to the Browns firing Freddie Kitchens on Sunday night. The guys discuss the mistake that Cleveland made last year by hiring him, just how disastrous this season was, what gig Kitchens might land next and who potential replacements are as the Browns begin yet another coaching search.
